messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: Politics has been dominated by party machines. Conservative, Labour and Liberal Democrat policies are very similar. UKIP policies are different and address things that affect you such as crime, immigration, student grants and political correctness. I believe in down-to-earth common sense policies not political dogma. As a committed Christian I will defend religious freedom and Christian values and fight for openness and integrity in public life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
I will oppose government house-building targets in crowded Blackpool and Wyre Borough.
I will campaign for government assistance for efforts to reopen the Poulton-le-Fylde to Fleetwood railway and to extend Blackpool tramway.

issues.immigration: UKIP policies are different and address things that affect you such as immigration.

housing.content: I will oppose government house-building targets in crowded Blackpool and Wyre Borough.

images.caption: Roy Hopwood - Blackpool North and Cleveleys
